description: Total number of fixed points in planted trees with n nodes.
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Probability that a point of a tree is fixed, Math. Proc. Camb. Phil. Soc. 85 (1979) 407-415.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
